alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso, northwestern Crowley and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 548 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pueblo Depot, or 11 miles east of Pueblo Airport, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Boone, Avondale, Pueblo Depot and Truckton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
